channel.title: 317 [PI] Bank
channel.description:
Hello, First I'm not sure if the problem is server side or client side so, if it is in the wrong section please move it.
My problem is that when i open my bank on my [PI] server and put the cursor on the buttons that i have circled in red in the picture under this, My client freezes and I will have to exit the client and reopen it. If anyone can tell me how to fix this please tell me. If u dont know how to fix, please just try telling me what is the problem with the buttons in bank.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/31/unledgu.png/][IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/8721/unledgu.png[/img][/URL]
Thanks.
